comments:
Description:
NPE is thrown out  when you refresh in the Parameter pan of the Procedure dataset

Step to reproduce 
1.open the design file attached
2.right click the dataset ?Dset_Oracle? in the Data Explorer
3.In the windows of ?Edit Data Set?, click the Parameters pane
4.right click in the parameters list and click ?Refresh?

Actual result;
  NPE error occurred

Created an attachment (id=43958)
The design file

One possible NPE problem in the source codes for DataSet parameter bindings caused this problem.

Added codes to check whether the value is null.

Verified in the build 200606120630

close it
